template.name: ngddir
template.value: /** * @ngdoc directive * @module <module> * @name <module>.directive:<entity> * @scope * @restrict AE * @param {type} paramName Parameter description goes here. * * @description * Directive description goes here. */$END$

template.name: ngdmethod
template.value: /** * @ngdoc method * @name unitName#methodName * @methodOf moduleName.unit:unitName#methodName * @param {param1Type} param1Name param1Description * @param {param2Type} param2Name param2Description * @returns {returnType} returnDescription * @description * Description goes here. */$END$
